allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete e-commerce functionality

Features:
- User authentication with Supabase \(login, signup, email confirmation\)
- Shopping cart with context-based state management
- Checkout flow with Square payment integration
- Order confirmation page

Admin Panel:
- Dashboard with stats overview
- Products management \(CRUD, image upload to Supabase Storage\)
- Orders management with status updates
- Customer management \(registered users and guest checkouts\)

UI Components:
- Mobile navigation
- User menu with auth state
- Cart icon with item count
- Product detail page with quantity selector

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
